name: Tic Tac Toe to the Death
name_original: Tic Tac Toe to the Death
description:
Objective: Grab the paint can in the middle building, then hold RB and quickly tap B to shake your spraypaint! Once fully charged, hold RB and press B to paint your symbol. Get 3 in a row, or 5 total to win. 

Attack your enemy and knock them off the building to prevent captures!

This is multiplayer only, and requires 2 xbox controllers (or any other x-input controller). There are keyboard controls for player 1, but it's terrible. keyboard controls removed for now.

This version is a drastic improvement from the previous version. The original prototype was made in 72 hours for a self-imposed game jam challenge with a few colleagues. We each made a game concept over the course of a weekend to decide which game concept we would go forward with. This version has updated player models from a purchased asset for prototyping, new effects, better combat, as well as sound effects and improved music implementation, as well as proper menus.

Music credits: 

"There It Is" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
